__e: Getting scared by a ghost is at least better than getting fooled by a person, huh sister?
Like whether or not he was lied to by the people who will be responsible for his death?
But since I'm a man, I know what it is to be cheated on by a woman.
The way they got around your mother. I thought she'd have better sense.
And for cheating on your mother all those years ago.
"I cheated on your mom with a girl who could be your big sister."
No. She just told me she knew how I had cheated on Nick, my husband, and then she asked me a lot of questions about him.
Why don't you just say that he always deceived all those he's had close?
You have not only cheated his mother and him but also me and my mother!
I had you fooled with all that street shit, huh?
For having spoken... to a younger boy.
I haven't cheated on you. I haven't asked for my own room.
Look, I may be an idiot for getting duped, but I'm not stupid.
He may cheat on me, but he's my husband after all.
And then this other time, well, it's not exactly that she deceived me but...
But you misled me, and you wasted my time.
You were right when you said that I deceived you, and you would never do that to me 'cause you're a good person.
I think one of us has been lied to and the other one, too.
I just tricked it into thinking time was going faster than it was.
that fool has left early in the morning to give tuition to someone.. ..leaving his daughter alone at home.
I had been tricked into marrying the father instead of the son... ..and there was nothing I could do about it.
that fool has left early in the morning to give tuition to someone.. ..leaving his daughter alone at home.
But if you don't know, if you've somehow kind of been tricked into this well, you might wanna speak up.
